mapper.select: select A.seq, A.userid, A.contentsId, A.title, A.image1,A.catId ,to_char(to_date(to_char(eventstartdate,'99999999'),'yyyy.mm.dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd'),to_char(to_date(to_char(cD.eventEndDate,'99999999'),'yyyy.mm.dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd'), cD.spendTime from(select pL.seq,pL.userid, pL.contentsId,C.title,C.image1,C.catId from pickList pL, contents C where pL.contentsId=C.contentsId) A, contentsDetail cD
